HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to add subtitle to your MP4
steps: Choose your video file or Click on the drop down arrow and select Dropbox/Google Drive
Wait patiently till the video gets loaded
Now click Upload Subtitle option to merge subtitle and download video.
Click Write Subtitles options to write subtitles manually
Click Export SRT to download your generated SRT File or Click save video to download your video with subtitles
